long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays live, upcoming and finished NBA games daily with an easy to read box score and top performers shown on the scoreboard. New drag-to-scroll for the box score makes this perfect for windows and mac users alike!
Game start times are shown in the users' local time, giving you a personalised NBA scoreboard in just one click!
